This repository includes source files of "GNN Transformation Framework for Improving Efficiency and Scalability" below:
process_spmm.py : Source file for precomputation of feature aggregation.
model.py : Source file for LC version GNNs and baselines.
run.ipynb : Jupyter notebook for running all procedures from precomputation to model training.

To run our codes, please open "run.ipynb" and execute cells from top to bottom.
